inclusion.criterion: If female, patient must have negative pregnancy test
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: All patients with clinical symptoms (ex: fever, chills, pain, tachycardia, hypotension), laboratory (leukocytosis) and radiologic findings (thick walled, rim-enhancing collection with gas bubbles or air-fluid levels) compatible with an abscess that requires image-guided percutaneous drainage
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Abscess cavity diameters will be less than or equal to 8 cm. However, abscess can be complex or loculated
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Approval by the primary care team to pursue PDT and discuss enrollment with the patient
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Allergy to contrast media, narcotics, sedatives, atropine or eggs
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Necrotic tissue that requires surgical debridement
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Severely compromised cardiopulmonary function or hemodynamic instability
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has a history of CAD, recently noted abdominal mass with fevers/rigors and bandemia. She underwent EUS with biopsy showing pancreatic adenocarcinoma at the head of pancreas.
